text: (Napiye!) Nam tutarkalil titacittamutaiyavarkal poramaiyaka iruntatu pol, nirum porumaiyutan iruppiraka! Ivarkalukkaka (vetanaiyai varavalaikka) avacarappatatir! Ivarkalukku vakkalikkappattatai ivarkal parkkum nalil, avarkal (ippumiyil) oru nalil oru nalikaikku mel irukkavillai (enru ennuvarkal. Itu) telivaka arivikka venitite! Enave, varampu miriyavarkal tavira (veru evarum) alikkappatuvarkala
